answers.answer: fatty liver can result in cirrhosis and is prevalent in patients with type 2 diabetes.  dietary changes may not make a major difference.  A recent study suggested that using vitamin E could slow the progression of fatty liver.  if the abdomen is bloated, it needs to be confirmed that she does not have fluid buildup indicative of liver failure.
